Body:
pexpect = pytest.importorskip('pexpect')
src = tests.any_test_help.get_random_dir_in_tmp() + '.json'
sut = pexpect.spawn('python3', ['-m', 'oval_graph.command_line',
    'arf-to-json', 'tests/test_data/ssg-fedora-ds-arf.xml',
    '_package_\\w+_removed'])
sut.expect('\\w+')
sut.send(key.DOWN)
sut.send(key.SPACE)
sut.send(key.UP)
sut.send(key.SPACE)
sut.send(key.ENTER)
sut.wait()
out = sut.readlines()
with open(src, 'w+') as f:
    f.writelines(row.decode('utf-8') for row in out[21:])
tests.any_test_help.compare_results_json(src)
out_dir = tests.any_test_help.get_random_dir_in_tmp()
sut = pexpect.spawn('python3', ['-m', 'oval_graph.command_line',
    'json-to-graph', '-o', out_dir, '--off-web-browser', src, '.'])
sut.expect('\\w+')
sut.send(key.DOWN)
sut.send(key.SPACE)
sut.send(key.ENTER)
sut.wait()
assert len(os.listdir(out_dir)) == 1
assert 'xccdf_org.ssgproject.content_rule_package_abrt_removed' in os.listdir(
    out_dir)[0]
